SELECT * FROM ISSUE WHERE ISSUE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchQuery} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ISSUE ( ISSUE_ID, PROJECT_ID, ISSUE_TITLE, ISSUE_CONTENT, TASK_ID, ISSUE_STATUS, ISSUE_CREATOR_ID, ISSUE_REG_DATE, ISSUE_MODIFY_DATE, ISSUE_MANAGER_ID, ISSUE_URGENCY ) VALUES ( 'ISSUE-' || LPAD(ISSUE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'), #{projectId}, #{issueTitle}, #{issueContent}, #{taskId}, #{issueStatus}, #{issueCreatorId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{issueManagerId}, #{issueUrgency} )
mapper.select: SELECT i.ISSUE_ID, i.PROJECT_ID, i.ISSUE_TITLE, i.ISSUE_CONTENT, i.TASK_ID, t.TASK_NAME, i.ISSUE_STATUS, i.ISSUE_CREATOR_ID, i.ISSUE_REG_DATE, i.ISSUE_MODIFY_DATE, i.ISSUE_DELETE_DATE, i.ISSUE_MANAGER_ID, i.ISSUE_URGENCY FROM ISSUE i LEFT JOIN TASK t ON i.TASK_ID = t.TASK_ID WHERE i.ISSUE_ID = #{issueId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ISSUE SET ISSUE_TITLE = #{issueTitle}, ISSUE_CONTENT = #{issueContent}, ISSUE_STATUS = #{issueStatus}, ISSUE_URGENCY = #{issueUrgency}, ISSUE_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ISSUE_ID = #{issueId}
